help.short: Name of the Access Control List

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="controlPlaneAclConfiguration">

<prop type="array" name="flags">

<prop type="array" name="ports">
<prop type="array" name="vlanGroups">
<prop type="array" name="vlans">

<prop type="array" name="actions">
<prop type="array" name="matchConditions">
<prop type="array" name="dscpMarkings">

<prop type="array" name="vlans">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="networkFabricIds">

help.short: Name of the Access Control List

command.name: create

help.short: Name of the Access Control List

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.controlPlaneAclConfiguration" options="control-plane-acl-configuration" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.controlPlaneAclConfiguration[].matchConfigurations" options="match-configurations">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.controlPlaneAclConfiguration[].matchConfigurations[].matchCondition.flags" options="flags"> <help short="Flags that need to be matched. Example: established | initial | . List of eligible TCP Flags are ack, cwr, ece, fin, psh, rst, syn, urg, established"/>
<arg type="array" var="@IcmpConfigurationProperties_create.icmpTypes" options="icmp-types">
<arg type="array" var="@ControlPlaneAclPortCondition_create.ports" options="ports">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations" options="dynamic-match-configurations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].ipGroups" options="ip-groups">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].ipGroups[].ipPrefixes" options="ip-prefixes">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].portGroups" options="port-groups">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].portGroups[].ports" options="ports">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].vlanGroups" options="vlan-groups">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].vlanGroups[].vlans" options="vlans">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations" options="match-configurations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].actions" options="actions">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions" options="match-conditions">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].dscpMarkings" options="dscp-markings">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].etherTypes" options="ether-types">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].fragments" options="fragments">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].icmpConfiguration.icmpTypes" options="icmp-types">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].ipCondition.ipGroupNames" options="ip-group-names">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].ipCondition.ipPrefixValues" options="ip-prefix-values">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].ipLengths" options="ip-lengths">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].portCondition.flags" options="flags"> <help short="List of protocol flags that need to be matched. Example: established | initial | . List of eligible TCP Flags are ack, fin, not-ack, not-fin, not-psh, not-rst, not-syn, not-urg, psh, rst, syn, urg"/>
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].portCondition.portGroupNames" options="port-group-names">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].portCondition.ports" options="ports">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].protocolNeighbors" options="protocol-neighbors">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].protocolTypes" options="protocol-types">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].ttlValues" options="ttl-values">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].vlanMatchCondition.innerVlans" options="inner-vlans">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].vlanMatchCondition.vlanGroupNames" options="vlan-group-names">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].vlanMatchCondition.vlans" options="vlans">

help.short: The geo-location where the resource lives

command.name: update

help.short: Name of the Access Control List

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$properties.properties.controlPlaneAclConfiguration" options="control-plane-acl-configuration" group="Properties">

<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.controlPlaneAclConfiguration[].matchConfigurations[].matchCondition.flags" options="flags"> <help short="Flags that need to be matched. Example: established | initial | . List of eligible TCP Flags are ack, cwr, ece, fin, psh, rst, syn, urg, established"/>
<arg type="array" var="@IcmpConfigurationPatchProperties_update.icmpTypes" options="icmp-types">
<arg type="array" var="@ControlPlaneAclPortCondition_update.ports" options="ports">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$properties.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations" options="dynamic-match-configurations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].ipGroups" options="ip-groups">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].ipGroups[].ipPrefixes" options="ip-prefixes">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].portGroups" options="port-groups">

<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].vlanGroups" options="vlan-groups">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.dynamicMatchConfigurations[].vlanGroups[].vlans" options="vlans">

<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].portCondition.flags" options="flags"> <help short="List of protocol flags that need to be matched. Example: established | initial | . List of eligible TCP Flags are ack, fin, not-ack, not-fin, not-psh, not-rst, not-syn, not-urg, psh, rst, syn, urg"/>

<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.matchConfigurations[].matchConditions[].vlanMatchCondition.vlans" options="vlans">
